name: 施陽正
objective: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
schedule:
1. 課程簡介與電子冷卻技術簡介 Course Outline & Introduction
2. 能量守恆 Energy Conservation
3. 基礎流力 Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics
4. 熱傳簡介 Introduction to Heat Transfer
5. 熱傳導 Conduction Heat Transfer
6. 強制對流: 外部流 Forced Convection Heat Transfer, I: External Flow
7. 強制對流: 內部流 Forced Convection Heat Transfer, II: Internal Flow
8. 自然對流 Natural Convection
9. 熱輻射 Radiation Heat Transfer
10. 延伸表面與接觸熱阻 Extended Surfaces and Thermal Interface Resistance
11. 期中考 Mid-term Exam
12. 元件與印刷電路板 Components and Printed Circuit Boards 
13.直接空氣冷卻與風扇 Direct Air Cooling and Fans
14.熱交換器與冷卻板 Heat Exchangers and Cold Plates
15.先進冷卻技術: 單相與兩相流冷卻 Advance Cooling Technologies,
    Single Phase and Two Phase Flow Cooling
16.熱管 Heatpipes
17.熱電致冷器 Thermoelectric Coolers
18.期末報告 Final Presentation
scorePolicy: 出席率及作業35%, 期中考30%, 期末報告35%
materials:
參考書籍: 
1. Yeh,  Lian-Tuu and  Chu, Richard C., "Thermal management of Microelectronic   Equipment-Heat Transfer Theory, Analysis Methods", and Design Practices,2002
2. Incropera, F.P., DeWitt, D.P., Bergman, T.L., and Lavine, A.S., “Fundamentals of Heat and Mass Transfer,” 6th Ed., 2007. 
3. Munson, B.R., Young, D.F. and Okiishi, T.H., “Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics,” 5th Ed., 2006.
4. Shabany , Y. “Heat Transfer: Thermal Management of Electronics”, 2009, CRC Press.
